title: Judgment on Edom
summary: Obadiah 1 contains a prophetic vision against Edom for their pride and violence against Israel. It ends with a promise of deliverance and restoration for God's people.

faq.question: Why is Edom judged in Obadiah?
faq.answer: Because of their arrogance and betrayal of Israel during its time of distress.

faq.question: What hope does Obadiah offer?
faq.answer: That the kingdom will belong to the Lord and Israel will be restored.
